references.reason: This work describes GPT-4, a large language model which informs the base structure upon which the world generator is built.
This reference is important as it explores diffusion models with transformers, the base technology upon which the Cosmos-Transfer1 model is built.

references.paper_title: Grounding Dino: Marrying Dino with Grounded Pre-training for Open-Set Object Detection
references.reason: This article details Grounding Dino, the model utilized for object detection and mask generation.

references.paper_title: Adding Conditional Control to Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
references.reason: This reference is important as it explores adding conditional control to text-to-image diffusion models, and is closely tied to the ControlNet approach adopted in Cosmos-Transfer1.

references.paper_title: Cosmos world foundation model platform for physical ai
references.reason: This work provides an overview of generative world model platform, which is crucial as it serves as the basis for Cosmos-Transfer1.
